name: Feral Attraction Demo
description:
Heyo! Welcome to Feral Attraction! A game where you can talk with and romance cute little animal characters! This game is still in Demo Mode, and this is all I've conjured up so far. But in this demo, you'll get to meet up with six fun and unique personalities:

Doki, Gerard, Popcorn, Miyah, Lika and Koey. These mammals are brimming with potential (that'll be explored in the final product) and I am more than excited to show them off to you in this early access version of Feral Attraction!

(Option to Download in progress ^^')
